entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Hyacinthe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
